text: Celeribacter persicus is a Gram-negative and mesophilic bacterium from the genus of Celeribacter which has been isolated from sediments of a mangrove forest from the Nayband Bay from the Iranian Persian Gulf. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Celeribacter persicus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Celeribacter persicus
